# File lib/jabber4r/protocol.rb, line 1098
1098:       def add_child(tag)
1099:         child = ParsedXMLElement.new(tag, self)
1100:         @element_children[tag] = Array.new if not @element_children.has_key? tag
1101:         @element_children[tag] << child
1102:         return child
1103:       end
